Package mdlg

Class RandomMazeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdlg.RandomMazeGenerator
  • class RandomMazeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the maze creation process

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static boolean[][] maze
      Stores the generated maze as a boolean matrix with true representing vacant cells and false otherwise
      private static java.util.Random random
      A random object used to generate random positions for placing the walls inside a chamber

      RandomMazeGenerator()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void createExits​(int h, int w)
      Creates the entrance and exit at the first possible position in the first and last rows of the maze
      private static void drawHoles​(int rs, int cs, int re, int ce, int v, int h)
      Draw holes/exits at three out of four wall-sections dividing a chamber
      private static void drawWalls​(int rs, int cs, int re, int ce, int vWall, int hWall)
      Divides a chamber into four sub-chambers by drawing a vertical and a horizontal wall
      protected static boolean[][] generateMaze​(int width, int height)
      The primary function that starts the maze generation process and calls other maze generation functions
      private static void mazifyChamber​(int rowStart, int colStart, int rowEnd, int colEnd)
      The recursive procedure to generate the maze through recursive-division

    • Method Detail

      • generateMaze

        protected static boolean[][] generateMaze​(int width,
                                          int height)
        The primary function that starts the maze generation process and calls other maze generation functions
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the maze in number of cells
        height - The height of the maze in number of cells
        Returns:
        The generated maze as a boolean matrix

      • mazifyChamber

        private static void mazifyChamber​(int rowStart,
                                  int colStart,
                                  int rowEnd,
                                  int colEnd)
        The recursive procedure to generate the maze through recursive-division
        Parameters:
        rowStart - The starting index of the row
        colStart - The starting index of the column
        rowEnd - The ending index of the row
        colEnd - The ending index of the column

      • drawWalls

        private static void drawWalls​(int rs,
                              int cs,
                              int re,
                              int ce,
                              int vWall,
                              int hWall)
        Divides a chamber into four sub-chambers by drawing a vertical and a horizontal wall
        Parameters:
        rs - The row-index of the top-left coordinate of the chamber
        cs - The column-index of the top-left coordinate of the chamber
        re - The row-index of the bottom-right coordinate of the chamber
        ce - The column-index of the bottom-right coordinate of the chamber
        vWall - The distance of the vertical wall from the left of the chamber
        hWall - The distance of the horizontal wall from the top of the chamber

      • drawHoles

        private static void drawHoles​(int rs,
                              int cs,
                              int re,
                              int ce,
                              int v,
                              int h)
        Draw holes/exits at three out of four wall-sections dividing a chamber
        Parameters:
        rs - The row-index of the top-left coordinate of the chamber
        cs - The column-index of the top-left coordinate of the chamber
        re - The row-index of the bottom-right coordinate of the chamber
        ce - The column-index of the bottom-right coordinate of the chamber
        vWall - The distance of the vertical wall from the left of the chamber
        hWall - The distance of the horizontal wall from the top of the chamber

      • createExits

        private static void createExits​(int h,
                                int w)
        Creates the entrance and exit at the first possible position in the first and last rows of the maze
        Parameters:
        h - The height of the maze in number of cells
        w - The width of the maze in number of cells
